sentences: Kaotasin selle seikleja vastu igasuguse huvi.
Ettekanne Ã¤ratas kelleski, pakkus kellelegi huvi.
context: The word 'kaotasin' is the 1st person singular past tense form of the Estonian verb 'kaotama', which means 'to lose'. It indicates that someone (the speaker) has experienced a loss. The example sentences show it used in context with losing interest ('igasuguse huvi') - losing all interest in something.
